description: A simple vegan breakfast frittata with a surprising spicy kick.
keywords: Frittata,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Egg free,Plant-based,Mushroom,Halal,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Tofu,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Frittata with Spiced Tofu Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large white onion, peeled and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a 9 inch skillet or similar oven proof pan to a medium heat and fry the mushrooms and onions for 4 minutes.
Place the rest of the ingredients in a food processor and blend until smooth.
Empty blended ingredients onto the skillet with the onions and mushrooms and transfer to the oven.
Bake the entire dish in the oven for 60 minutes before serving or until the edges and top start to brown nicely.
